ygData.subject: Hi, new to list and tinkering
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I m Twilyte, Wizard of the 22nd season, Terris - Thule Server.  I had an Erudite Wizard and changed over at level 17 for many obvious reasons about 48
ygData.messageBody:
Hi, I'm Twilyte, Wizard of the 22nd season, Terris - Thule Server.  I had an Erudite Wizard and changed over at level 17 for many obvious reasons about 48 hours a go.  One of my major points in deciding to go Gnome (other than cuter and can't sharpen weapons on my forehead)  was tinkering.  However I know nothing about it.  I have trained as many points into it as it would let me.  But don't know where to start.  Can anyone help me with some friendly advice on raising tinkering quickly and as cheaply as possible?  I have a level 60 ranger as a main so funds are limited but obtainable.  Any suggestions and such you can offer would be greatly appreciated.

Twilyte
